meta.name: Native Fixes
meta.tagline: Various configurable fixes for Discord and Electron

devtoolsThemeFix.description: Temporary workaround for devtools defaulting to light theme on Electron 32

disableRendererBackgrounding.description: This is enabled by default as a power saving measure, but it breaks screensharing and websocket connections fairly often

vulkan.description: Uses the Vulkan backend for rendering

linuxAutoscroll.displayName: Enable middle click autoscroll on Linux
linuxAutoscroll.description: Requires manual configuration of your system to disable middle click paste, has no effect on other operating systems

linuxSpeechDispatcher.displayName: Enable speech-dispatcher for TTS on Linux
linuxSpeechDispatcher.description: Fixes text-to-speech. Has no effect on other operating systems

vaapi.description: Provides hardware accelerated video encode and decode. Has no effect on other operating systems

vaapiIgnoreDriverChecks.displayName: Ignore VAAPI driver checks on Linux
vaapiIgnoreDriverChecks.description: Forces hardware video acceleration on some graphics drivers at the cost of stability. Has no effect on other operating systems

linuxUpdater.description: Actually implements updating Discord on Linux. Has no effect on other operating systems

linuxHevcSupport.description: You might also need to enable Vulkan renderer. Has no effect on other operating systems

disableFontations.description: May improve blurry font rendering. Has no effect on other operating systems
